AboutSection.title: TemanDifa
AboutSection.description: TemanDifa was born out of concern for accessibility for people with disabilities, We believe that technology should be a bridge, not a barrier. By combining Artificial Intelligence, TemanDifa is here to make it easier for people with disabilities to do activities, learn, and communicate independently.

ProblemSection.subtitle: Background
ProblemSection.global_stats_suffix: living with vision impairment ranging from low vision to total blindness.
ProblemSection.local_stats_suffix: visually impaired people, with a significant number of hearing impaired people as well. Many of them face major obstacles in daily independence.

Features.feature1_desc: Camera detects objects around the user instantly, helping to recognize the user's surroundings.
Features.feature2_desc: Scans documents or writing using the camera, then converts it into text or voice so users can immediately hear the document content.
Features.feature3_desc: Converts voice to text so hearing-impaired users can follow conversations
Features.feature4_desc: Provides an option to connect with volunteers ready to help directly via video call

ClosingHero.description: An app designed to empower people with disabilities to explore the world with confidence - becoming their eyes, ears, and assistant.

Footer.tagline: See with confidence, Hear clearly, Be help when needed.

AboutPage.title: About TemanDifa
AboutPage.meta_description: Learn more about TemanDifa, our vision and mission to create digital accessibility for people with disabilities in Indonesia
AboutPage.description_1: TemanDifa was born out of concern for accessibility for people with disabilities. We believe that technology should be a bridge, not a barrier.
AboutPage.description_2: By combining Artificial Intelligence, TemanDifa is here to make it easier for people with disabilities to do activities, learn and communicate independently.
AboutPage.vision_text: To be the leading technology platform that empowers people with disabilities to live independently and confidently in their daily activities.
AboutPage.mission_1: Provide accessible AI technology for people with disabilities
AboutPage.mission_2: Increase independence for people with disabilities

ProductPage.title: TemanDifa Features
ProductPage.subtitle: AI technology designed specifically to assist people with disabilities in daily activities
ProductPage.cta_desc: Download the TemanDifa app now and experience accessibility ease at your fingertips

features.detection_desc: Camera detects objects around the user instantly, helping to recognize the surroundings with AI technology.
features.voice_desc: Converts speech to text so hearing-impaired users can follow conversations easily and in real-time.
features.scan_desc: Scans documents or writing using the camera, then converts it into text or voice so users can immediately hear the document content.
features.emergency_desc: Provides an option to connect with volunteers ready to help directly via video call at any time.
